Html:
I have implemented the DeleteOlderThan functionality for the MSSQL cache secondairy cache.
See my own fork of Gmap.NET.

Delete the old GmapNETcache table or If you want to keep the cache just run this SQL script on the GmapNETcache table.
alter table dbo.GMapNETcache add [DateTime] datetime NOT NULL default '2013-07-05 23:00:00.000';
